snippet.title: Syria conflict: Kicking for hope in Zaatari refugee camp
snippet.description:
* Amongst the clouds of dust kicked up from the desert by the hundreds of new arrivals who pitch up every day at the Zaatari refugee camp -- just 15 kilometers from the Jordan/Syria border -- Abeer Rantisi is planning her next lesson.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/14/sport/football/zaatari-refugee-camp/index.html

snippet.title: Ukraine claims USA scalp, Kosovo held
snippet.description:
* As the Ukraine players stood silent on the football field in Larnaca, Cyprus, they could be forgiven for allowing their minds to wander.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/05/sport/kosovo-ukraine-football/index.html

snippet.title: How can World Cup teams win penalty shootouts?
snippet.description:
* Here's a study that teams playing in the World Cup soccer tournament would be well-advised to heed: the trick to a successful penalty kick is to look at the ball; not the goalkeeper.
http://www.cnn.com/2010/SPORT/06/10/sport.soccer.penalty.kick/index.html

snippet.title: Soccer fans beware: Virus a click away
snippet.description:
* It's the oldest trick in the virus writer's handbook.
http://www.cnn.com/2005/TECH/internet/05/03/sobernworm/index.html

snippet.title: Mind over matter: Soccer's bid to train the brain
snippet.description:
* Today's soccer professionals have a battery of physios, fitness trainers and doctors all striving to fine-tune their players' physique for optimum performance.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/02/26/sport/football/football-brain-mourinho-messi/index.html

snippet.title: World Cup bras offering support
snippet.description:
* A little extra lift is being offered to spectators for the Japan and Korea soccer finals -- in the form of two shapely World Cup cups.
http://www.cnn.com/2002/WORLD/worldcup/05/08/worldcup.bras/index.html

snippet.title: Egypt's revolution: 'We fell in love, but it was a trick'
snippet.description:
* A leather-faced Egyptian fruit seller said it best: "The revolution was like a beautiful woman. She charmed us, and we fell in love with her and killed the tyrant to marry her, but she was just a trick \-- another burden to add to our heavy load, and we are falling out of love."
http://www.cnn.com/2012/05/23/opinion/egypt-revolution-heartbreak/index.html

snippet.title: Keep kids from cheating in school
snippet.description:
* You're a typical fourth-grader. You've got soccer three afternoons this week, two birthday parties, piano, chess club, recycling club, and making-stuff-from-duct- tape club. On top of all that, you're supposed to write a big report about tornadoes -- and you know Mom and Dad will freak if you bring home a bad grade. Would...
http://www.cnn.com/2012/01/17/living/kids-cheating-school-p/index.html

snippet.title: The billion-dollar grudge match: The enormity of El Clasico
snippet.description:
* There are few rivalries in sport that capture the imagination like the coming together of Real Madrid and Barcelona -- a soccer match of such enormity that it has its own nickname: "El Clasico."
http://www.cnn.com/2011/SPORT/football/04/19/el.clasico.rivalry/index.html

snippet.title: The 51 fastest fat burners
snippet.description:
* Erase extra flab with these super-effective tricks.
